ai
Class BattleAction

java.lang.Object
  ai.BattleAction

public class BattleAction
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a battle action by a card, with it's value, cost, and worth ratio to a player. Also contains logic to perform the action.

Nested Class Summary

          Enumerator for the different action types

Constructor Detail

BattleAction

public BattleAction(BattleAction.ActionType t,
                    Card a,
                    int b,
                    int c)
Creates a new BattleAction.

Parameters:
t - the type of action being represented
a - the card that represents an action (Example: Race card means use that Race's special ability; Item card means use that item; etc)
b - the number of levels this action will add to the player's current battle level
c - the value that the player will lose by using this action

BattleAction

public BattleAction(BattleAction.ActionType t,
                    Card a,
                    int b,
                    int c,
                    java.lang.Object obj)
Creates a new BattleAction.

Parameters:
t - the type of action being represented
a - the card that represents an action (Example: Race card means use that Race's special ability; Item card means use that item; etc)
b - the number of levels this action will add to the player's current battle level
c - the value that the player will lose by using this action
obj - the player, monster, etc. that this action will be performed on

Returns:
the number of battle levels that will be gained by performing this action

setBenefit

public void setBenefit(int b)
Sets the number of battle levels that will be gained by performing this action. This is used whenever other actions of more worth change the value of this action.

Parameters:
b - the level number to set the benefit to

getCost

public int getCost()
Returns the value that it will cost to perform this battle action.

Returns:
the value that it will cost to perform this battle action

getWorth

public double getWorth()
Returns the worth of this battle action, an absolute ratio of benefit over cost.

Returns:
the worth of this battle action, an absolute ratio of benefit over cost

perform

public boolean perform(Battle battle,
                       Player player)
                throws EndGameException
Performs the battle action if it has worth and returns whether or not it was performed.

Parameters:
battle - battle to perform action in
player - player performing the action
Throws:
EndGameException
